name: OptOne
0:
”Alexa, ask Opt One to choose from cake or pizza or donuts”
”Alexa, ask Opt One to pick from chicken or lamb or potatoes or salad”
”Alexa, ask Opt One to decide from pizza or cake or donuts or smoothie”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: opt one
des: When you can't decide what to opt for among the list of choices, let Alexa pick one for you.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
